mapper.sql: id, user_name, real_name, password, msg_code, status, is_del, create_time, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where 1=1
and user_name = #{username}
limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, user_name, real_name, password, msg_code, status, is_del, create_time, update_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_code = #{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
